Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Interface ILifecycleObserver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LifecycleStateObserver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LifecycleObserver

    public interface ILifecycleObserver
    Identifies a class as a ILifecycleObserver. The child classes that implement this interface provide related methods.

    You can call the Lifecycle#addObserver(ILifecycleObserver) method to add LifecycleObserver objects to the observer list. After that, the objects will be notified if the lifecycle state of an Ability or AbilitySlice changes.

    Instead of implementing ILifecycleObserver, you can only use LifecycleObserver or LifecycleStateObserver to observe lifecycle changes of an Ability or AbilitySlice.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    LifecycleObserver, LifecycleStateObserver
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY
